tweet: Still making rings and wreathes - so much to do, so little time!
The man's changing the gas cooker - fab, the first one was vile.Made gorgeous willow rings for Christmas fairs next week.Where & when later.
Gathered 7 bags of leaves and hid them in a corner to rot down. Next year it'll be great leaf mould.  Don't bin your leaves,compost them!
Made my first advent ring today - very pretty and first of many I suspect.
Another great fair - thanks Green Hammerton, back to the gardening tomorrow!
